name: Papp
description:
This game was made as part of the Tools & Technologies 3 course at UE.

Game Description

Play as the paper-like yellow figure running, jumping, and gliding across the office room, avoiding or jumping on dangerous office supplies. Collect upgrades to help fight certain enemies.

▪ WASD to move

▪ Space to jump

▪ hold space to glide/float

Can you make it to the end without dying?

Repository Link

Check out my repository.

Credits

Art, Code, Design by Sunaina "Sunny" Miller

Peanut Money font by jeti

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

Please include the following bits of information into your credits as well:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of  Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by:  Kevin Hagen "Tools & Technologies 3: Digital & Analogue Techniques"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
